body_html: I don't think this is caused by slurm assigning tasks to the same nodes. As long as the tasks are specified to each node specifically they can run correctly. I have run into the situation where some tasks assigned to the same node, I will try to post that error message later, different from what I post here.

body: I don't think this is caused by slurm assigning tasks to the same nodes. As long as the tasks are specified to each node specifically they can run correctly. I have run into the situation where some tasks assigned to the same node, I will try to post that error message later, different from what I post here.
